alert.note: Alert for Yuma (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 19 at 10:31PM MST until August 19 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM MST FOR CENTRAL YUMA COUNTY... At 1031 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles north of Wellton, or 15 miles northeast of Fortuna Foothills, moving southwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fortuna Foothills, Wellton, Blaisdell, Ligurta, Kinter and Roll. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 11 and 36. AZ Route 95 between mile markers 33 and 49. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
